component.name: Geode Linux Installer
component.summary: Bringing mod support to Geometry Dash.

description.p:
Geode is a fan-made extension for Geometry Dash that adds mod support to the game. Browse from an in-game list to seamlessly download mods on Linux!
**Heads up:** this installer requires broad filesystem access to detect Steam installations and game libraries that may be located on external drives or custom mount points.
